channel.title: Adding weapons shops(rsc)
channel.description:
difficulty 1/10 source : rscd --------------------------------------------------------------------------
things you need gz compresser and 30% of a brain -------------------------------------------------------------------------- goto server\conf\defs\extras\shopdef, right click and hit edit ok lets look at one of my shops
Code: <int>6</int> <!-- shields --> <ShopDef> <canSell>false</canSell> <items> <ItemShopDef> <!--cape --> <item>2</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>250</price> </ItemShopDef> <ItemShopDef> <!-- cape --> <item>129</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>750</price> </ItemShopDef> <ItemShopDef> <!-- cape --> <item>433</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>1750</price> </ItemShopDef> <ItemShopDef> <!-- cape --> <item>130</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>3250</price> </ItemShopDef> <ItemShopDef> <!-- cape --> <item>131</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>13575</price> </ItemShopDef>those are the shop items ok lets look at one of the capes
Code: <ItemShopDef> <!-- cape --> <item>131</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>13575</price> </ItemShopDef>now lets change it to dragon 2h item id for me 76 so lets do it
Code: <ItemShopDef> <!-- dragon 2h --> <item>76</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>13575</price> </ItemShopDef>ok now lets save it, then use the gz compresser and compress shopdef -------------------------------------------------------------------------- now run the server (H)enjoy
(i have written a couple of tutorials for rsc and it took me 4 hours all to geather hope you like em)

and 30% of a brain

goto server\conf\defs\extras\shopdef, right click and hit edit ok lets look at one of my shops
